website_summaries.verdict: For those seeking a serious lip treatment product that doubles as a sun protection balm.
pros: Goes on smoothly and doesn’t leave a sticky residue
Available in a formula that’s odorless and flavorless
Includes natural ingredients that moisturize and hydrate lips
cons: Squeeze-type applicator may cause users to over-apply and waste product

customer_reviews.title: not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real jack black lip balm. Also it barely has vitamin E and shea butter. it is listed as INACTIVE ingredients. Its mainly petroleum which is the same as using vaseline on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought everything on the market for my dry, irritated, chapped lips. This really works. Trust me, you must give this in a try if you are desperate for healing.
customer_reviews.author: rona

customer_reviews.title: Is this a knockoff?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not convinced this is the authentic product. I've been using Jack Black lip balm for years. The packaging looks and feels wrong. The blue is the wrong hue, and the tube should be more flexible. Then the product itself is wonky. Doesn't have the nice scent I know it should be, and this feels like straight up petroleum jelly. Comparing label to the getjackblack.com website, there's a couple label discrepancies. Pretty sure I've been duped. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennchi

customer_reviews.title: rather than just coating them for a few hours or even making them worse (and I've tried a LOT of different products)
customer_reviews.text: I got the Shea Butter flavor. It isn't overpowering or even particularly noticeable, which is what I was hoping for. More importantly, it actually hydrates my lips. In the 2 weeks I've had it, I've found that I reach for it less and less. I used to put on Chapstick every few hours, but I only put this on a few times a day. I wasn't thrilled about the price, but it gets 5 stars for being the only product I've tried that actually improves my lips' hydration, rather than just coating them for a few hours or even making them worse (and I've tried a LOT of different products). I'll definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCatLady72

customer_reviews.title: Severe allergic reaction, which is strange because I’ve used ...
customer_reviews.text: Severe allergic reaction, which is strange because I’ve used lip balms with Shea butter or vitamin E in it before....my lips are so swole, and I have tiny bumps all over top and bottom lip. It hurts so bad
customer_reviews.author: DaZohna J

customer_reviews.title: Good product but fake re-orders delivered
customer_reviews.text: If given a choice, the actual product when you buy it originally, is VERY GOOD! It really moisturizes your lips and leaves it soft and plump. The negative part is don’t buy this product here in Amazon. They will deliver your first order with the original one, but the re-orders are already fake. I was able to validate it by buying one from Nordstrom. They have different ingredients and also, you can immediately compare the effects on your lips. I won’t post photos of the comparison so they won’t know the features of the original lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Kikosmom

customer_reviews.title: Not as I remember..
customer_reviews.text: I tried this at Sephora a few years ago and absolutely loved it. I purchased again recently and was really disappointed. I remember it being super moisturizing but the two flavors I got, lemon and blackberry tea, we're super drying. I'm not sure if they changed the formula or if it has always been this way. Either way I returned both and will not be purchasing this again. Sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Meechelios

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective, Wouldn't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this off a friend's recommendation but this ended up being a less than average lip balm for me. It pretty much felt like vaseline on my lips which for this price, I expected something nicer. It also never felt like it absorbed into my lips because they didn't feel softer and instead felt more chapped which meant I constantly needed a thick layer on to stop that from happening. It also gets really goopy at times and the plastic tip gets messy. Regular chapstick has honestly been more effective than this product for me, I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jacky

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special, Not Worth A Premium
customer_reviews.text: It is a premium product, and touts super-moisturizing effects, but I'm not seeing anything special about it. It feels like regular Vaseline-based loop goop, with a bit of tingle (ooh! Tea Tree effect!). Who knows is it protects against the sun (that isn't why I bought it). Nevertheless, my dry-lip cure quest continues because my lips are slippery but not at all healed. Back to the grocery store for more of the inexpensive stuff, and the quest continues.
customer_reviews.author: anomalink

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product ZERO stars, I definitely would. After using this lip balm twice, my lips looked like the cracked earth after a major drought and they are still peeling. I have used this in the past without a problem, so I have to question whether this is authentic. At any rate, it's not worth returning and I would not recommend this to anyone. Lesson learned......plus it has petroleum as a major ingredient.....HORRIBLE....
customer_reviews.author: lynn gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes with all the positive reviews, but this just wasn’t it for me. I have really dry lips, and have a hard time finding something that doesn’t actually make them worse. Many products make them more flaky. The jack black just seemed to sit on top of my lips. It was very thick. I didn’t like spf being included. I chose the grapefruit scent and was not a fan at all. I wouldn’t purchase again. It’s quite expensive for lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetmama

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Omg please DON’T buy this! I do not have sensitive skin or lips by any means and this product within a few uses BURNED my lips in what I feel is a chemical burn! It hurts incredibly bad even 3 days after stopping using it and applying neosporin to my lips. I’m so glad Amazon gave me my money back, but I hope they stop selling this lip balm and I hope the makers stop making it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ingersol

customer_reviews.title: has 40.2% petrolatum, item needs ingredients list
customer_reviews.text: RETURNING! I never saw an ingredient list when I bought this, . IF there had been one, would never have bought, as I am definitely NOT using petrolatum ( aka vaseline) on lips. I just figured it would be a healthier lip balm, and it gets great reviews. I bought grapefruit flavor. Buyers and allergy sufferers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Really like, but falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lip balm and it works wonderfully on chapped lips, BUT after about a week of using the top has started to separate from the tube & so the balm comes out of the side. I can still use it, but it’s messy.
customer_reviews.author: R.Lang

customer_reviews.title: Chemical burn or allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this because of my chronic dry lips, but after 3 days of use they became wrinkled and then I woke up with HUGE red, swollen lips. They were peeling on the edges and I may have some bumps, too - I feel like it's more of a chemical reaction than allergic. Will have to see a doctor soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't believe it but it's true...FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Southeast Texas and have always had chronic dry lips. I've constantly applied lip balms, but my lips didn't improve. They just made it a little more bearable. I wasn't sure I wanted to spend the money to try these, but I was desperate. So glad I did! I ordered the set of 3 (best value), and I love them! My lips got better immediately. The flavors are very subtle, which is a plus. Thank you Jack Black!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: " At first I didn't like it but I think I was putting too much ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product. I never spend $10 on lip balm ever. But after hearing a positive review of this product on youtube, I thought "hey why not?" At first I didn't like it but I think I was putting too much on. A little dab'll do ya. This is the best lip balm ever-- and trust me, I've tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Minty & Plumping
customer_reviews.text: Yaaas!! I am obsessed. This is the go to ladies. Although this is a men's brand, ladies I am telling you buy it. This is a fresh minty hydrating lip balm. Because of the minty-ness in it, the balm adds fullness to your lips. It is definitely more of a balm than a gloss because it is not shiny and if you apply it too liberally it will look like there is white on your lips, so be aware. This is hands down the best lip product ever. Doesn't do that annoying thing and cause your lips to become addicted to it and chap up if you stop using it. Quality stuff. Just buy it, you will see!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for Accutane users!
customer_reviews.text: I’m currently in my 6th and final month of my Accutane treatment. Anyone taking Accutane will tell you, the first and main side effect is DRY LIPS! I just purchased my 7th tube of this magnificent stuff. I tried multiple products before this and nothing but this helped!! I will say, I don’t think it’s as effective for sun protection than it is for moisturizing, but I don’t use it for sun protection. I will keep this as an essential even after my Accutane treatment is done!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients on tube different from listing - has beeswax
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this because of the great reviews and the fact that the Amazon listing shows that there is no beeswax in the formulation. I cannot put beeswax formulations on my lips because it is very drying. I received my tube in the mail today and beeswax is listed as the 3rd ingredient. Ive been wearing it for a couple hours now and it feels very thick and sticky on my lips. They don't feel smooth or moisturized at all. Very dissapointed and will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin B

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a lip balm that works!!! I was suffering with extremely dry lips. It was so bad they looked red and it hurt to smile. I tried pretty much every product I could find (including some very expensive lip treatments) and nothing worked. I was losing hope and was considering scheduling an appointment with a dermatologist when I decided to try this out based on the excellent reviews and I'm so glad I did!!! It's the only product that keeps my lips beautifully moisturized, has SPF AND is affordable!!!
customer_reviews.author: aoceg

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem to be legit
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this same lip balm previously and it was fantastic. I got a new tube today and it is gritty. I'm not sure if they changed the formula or if it is a bad batch. Needless to say, I am pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rosalie

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: I have the worst lips because they constantly cause me discomfort and pain. The sting and dry out like leather and crack and I can't help but constantly peel the sharp pieces of dead skin off which cause them to bleed. I have tried so many chapsticks; Vaseline, aquaphor ointment, burts bees, rosebud, and they all glide on and right off without doing a thing. This one works! The menthal is soothing to hot stinging lips and I only have to apply every few hours and my lips are actually getting healthier! I will continue using this and now am curious to try other products in the line, although they are designed for men, I care what works best.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Belladonna

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: After several rounds of Accutane I became addicted to lip moisturizers. I've tried soooo many different ones. I decided to try this one after I read all of the positive reviews and those people were definitely right. This has an immediate soothing and quenching effect on my lips. I keep it with me at all times but I have found that I don't need to use it as much compared to others that I have tried. So the moisturizing effects are definitely lasting much longer than the others. It also works very well as a base for colored glosses and liquid lipsticks. I even use it with some matte lipsticks to combat the drying effects and that works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Snow

customer_reviews.title: Feels grainy doesn’t absorb
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this but just didn’t last as long as the Mario B lip balm. Formula is a little thick and doesn’t glide on very smoothly. It almost feels grainy to me when I put on and doesn’t absorb well. Maybe I got a lemon product or it’s not the real thing! The reviews were amazing but it just didn’t live up to me. Also just feels like petroleum and it just sits on the lips doesn’t feel nourishing or like it’s being absorbed at all. Will not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Stenson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lip Balm Product
customer_reviews.text: This lip balm is incredible. As a person who has taken multiple rounds of Accutane over the past 20 years, I know lip balms and chapsticks like the back of my hand. I was a long Aquaphor devotee. At any time, you could find 5-10 Aquaphor tubes floating around in my purse, car, office, etc. After trying this, the Jack Black balms with Shea butter are hands down my favorite. It is not too thick and actually seems to provide moisture to my lips, unlike Aquaphor which just seals them. I went through my first tube in a month because I loved this product so much. I also love that it offers SPF protection.
customer_reviews.author: CLo2006

customer_reviews.title: Best. Lipbalm. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an affordable lip balm that actually hydrates your lips, this is it. I got an incredible lip balm in my birthday gift at a beauty store, but when I went to purchase a full size version it was like $18. For lip balm? No way! So I looked for alternatives and found a lot of recommendations for Jack Black. I am SO glad I decided to try it. This is just as good as the $18 lip balm I originally wanted and it's over half the price! This is my new favorite and I will be repurchasing this as long as they continue to make it.
customer_reviews.author: The Tiny RedheadTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Taste It!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a wide variety (burts bees, blistex, chapstick, aquaphor, banana boat...) of lip balms with SPF and I always end up with this nasty taste in my mouth. The only lip balms I could find with SPF that I didn't taste were the ones that were mineral based (zinc providing the spf), but they always left my lips feeling weird and looking pale. Absurd amounts of googling and review-reading led me to Jack Black. I don't know what the magic here is, but I don't taste it and it makes my lips feel amazing. I got Shea Butter, but I imagine the magic applies to all. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Suffocates my lips, and is essentially just petroleum jelly
customer_reviews.text: I wantedthis to be the magic, miracle lip balm, but I can't keep it on my lips for more than 15 minutes because it is uncomfortable. It feels like my lips are suffocating; basically like slathering Vaseline over my lips. That is essentially what this is. It is to SPF and petroleum. I would not waste my money on this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly King

customer_reviews.title: Not sure they are worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I am a women who loves lip sticks,balms,moisturizers,gloss..etc. These are okay. It doesn't go on gooey but is about the texture of Vaseline. The flavors are okay but a bit strong for what I prefer. As for the SPF..who knows if it is working. If it is then I guess the price is worth it but you will need to reapply. Feels pretty much like putting Vaseline on. One and done for me...
customer_reviews.author: mbird

customer_reviews.title: Once You Go Black, You'll Never Go Back.
customer_reviews.text: I know it's pricey, but I don't think I can ever go back to Chapstick or Carmex. It moisturizes very well and the SPF 25 protects from the sun, and I live in a really heat-heavy city. The sun protection helps me prevent fever blisters pretty well as a victim of Herpes Simplex 1. There isn't much flavor, but the cool, freezing feeling from applying this to your lips feels sooooo good. (I'm not the only one who says this.)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Half full, but good product...
customer_reviews.text: My tube was half full. That's ridiculous for $10. When I emailed the seller about it, this is the response I received... I feel like I got ripped off. If not for that, this product is great for accutane lips. "We appreciate the order you placed with Fine Gift Soaps on Amazon.com. The Jack Black Lip Balm tubes are factory filled and sealed with .25 oz of balm - the fill process is completed with the latest computer controlled equipment and weight scales. Although the tube may appear to be less than full is contains the exact amount of balm that is stated on the tube label. Thank you, Fine Gift Soaps Customer Support 866-580-5288"
customer_reviews.author: MonicaMM

customer_reviews.title: Thick, durable lip balm sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go-to lip balm. It's thick enough that you don't need to reapply constantly, it's got a good SPF rating, but it doesn't have that off taste that some SPF lip balms have. It's been excellent for summer running and cycling, and I look forward to the thickness of it in winter. I've got the blackberry and the shea butter, and the flavors are very mild, more or less flavorless within a minute of application -- which is good, because flavorless and unscented would be my ideal. Shea butter has less flavor than the blackberry, but either one is fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: MacDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Not only do I come home feeling like a prune
customer_reviews.text: I'm doing archaeology in the Mojave desert this fall, and let me tell you, it is DRY. Not only do I come home feeling like a prune, but my lips are peeling no matter how much chapstick I use. Last weekend, I used Jack Black's Intense Therapy Lip Balm, in their Shea Lemon flavor, and it was great. It's thick enough to give you some protection, and because it's 25 SPF, ti kept my lips from burning or drying out. Needless to say, I came home with my lips fully intact, and this has now become an essential item when I'm out in the desert field. Not only when I'm out there, but I also use this every day now.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmetic Chemist turned Archaeologist

customer_reviews.title: Its lit
customer_reviews.text: I live in Washington state so sun protection isnt really important. I dont think I saw the sun until I took my first legal drink so its protecting me mostly from being a crusty crab and not the bikini bottom good kind.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Have mint and black tea blackberry.
customer_reviews.text: I have ised this for years and was excited it was now on amazon and in more flavors as it is hard to find a nice moisturizing lip product esp with spf where you cannot taste the spf at all! I got mint (my personal fav for years) and the black tea blackberry. The black tea blackberry tasted like tea with a tiny tiny tiny hint of the blackberry so I was bummed it didnt taste more like berry. The product itself it great though. Highly recommend. (I have also tried lemon in the past which is good!)
customer_reviews.author: Wyk

customer_reviews.title: A new favorite
customer_reviews.text: For as long as I can remember, I've been addicted to chapsticks. I've tried a lot of different kinds and have had a few favorites. I think I can now add this one to my list of favorites. Especially because it has SPF, which I know I need but haven't been disciplined about. The balm moisturizes really well, leaving a thin, smooth coating for hours, so I find myself applying way less throughout the day. The scent - black tea & blackberry - is very subtle and I only notice it right after applying. When I run out of this tube, I'll probably try one of the other flavors. It's definitely a quality product that I'd recommend trying out.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but it's pretty much minty vaseline!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I thought it was gonna be something other than just petroleum jelly, beeswax, and peppermint. I could have bought 2 or 3 lip balms from another brand with the same ingredients for the same price. I like that there were several "flavors," and also that it has SPF in it, but I was expecting better ingredients. The squeezy tube is convenient, but the applicator is a little difficult to work with. I would not purchase again, but I will use up the tube that I bought because I'm not letting $7 go to waste!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Incredible, and works so fast!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a really bad habit of chewing on my lips this past winter. My bottom lip would heal but I could not get the top of my top lip to heal. I tried coconut oil, vaseline, argan oil, traditional chapsticks, coconut oil chap-stick, and emu oil but nothing would heal my top lip for months. This stuff healed my lips in ONE night. I can't believe how awesome this stuff is, I will never be without it! It looks, smells, and feels beautiful on the lips.
customer_reviews.author: Paiute

customer_reviews.title: SHHH ...HIDDEN SECRET
customer_reviews.text: If you already don't know about JACK BLACK you haven't been living on this planet. But then again most of us intentionally dont do reviews bc we dont want our favs to run out :) From time to time they do, bc every smart person buys in bulk. Lol. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED. MY COLLEGE KIDS COME HOME AT HOLIDAY AND TAKE OFF WITH OURS!! Yes, it's that good...awesome self care and great for gift giving!
customer_reviews.author: C Flores

customer_reviews.title: This is it.
customer_reviews.text: People - this is it. This lip balm is the best out there. I feel like I have tried EVERYTHING - Baby Lips, EOS, Vaseline, Burt’s Bees, Aquaphor, The Body Shop, ChapStick, Carmex, Blistex, etc - and this is by far the best. I like the shea butter one. It has no weird flavor, no weird smell, it is long-lasting, and it’s ultra-moisturizing. What more can you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Defective packaging
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in product packaging. It kept leaking and I realized when I was squeezing it, the product was coming out of the bottom part of the container. So I had to throw it out, brand new. Pictures attached.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Payne

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I have never felt any lip care that moisturizes as much as this does on my lips!! Giving it a four star because I ordered once and the order was "cancelled" for literally no reason. I had to wait a few days for my refund. I ordered a second time and this time it went through and I'm very glad it did. I don't know how much protection it actually gave my lips but it felt so nice. I'm very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Pierce

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products of all time.
customer_reviews.text: These dont actually have any flavor, its just a difference in the scent that they add that make up the different flavors. Anyway, as my title says, its my favorite product ever. Ive owned over 20 of these and always have multiple at the house. No need for any long explanation. Forget about Burt's Bees and Chapstick. These are all you will need going forward. Simple.
customer_reviews.author: DACo

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, no nasty sunscreen flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that there is ZERO nasty sunscreen flavor. I’ve tried a ton of other brands. All have that horrible chemical taste. This will be my go-to from now on! Chose the mint kind. It’s pretty intense (which I like) but just a warning for those who may be sensitive. It’s pretty tingly. There is a slight petroleum scent under the mint, but not strong enough to taste. Formula feels great on lips, like a true balm. Not waxy or slick. Doesn’t leave a white cast on lips like some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Honey egg enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Best lip balm! Been using for years
customer_reviews.text: Favorite lip balm. I am constantly buying and trying new lip balm but i keep coming back to these. I have sjogren's which is a autoimmune condition that makes my lips crazy dry and this is the only thing that works consistently. Stays on a long time (overnight for sure). I like the mint and the shea butter flavors, but the others can be a bit overwhelming. I wish there was a bulk pack of the shea butter flavor which it's really just a mild vanilla
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ru

customer_reviews.title: Best hydrating lip balm for men & women!
customer_reviews.text: Best lip balm! I started using this after trying my husband's and I loved it so much I had to buy my own. This is the only lip balm that soothes and hydrates my lips and doesn't make them clump and peel. It makes my lips smooth and minty fresh! The bonus is the spf.
customer_reviews.author: MomLifeGreatWife

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lip balm/moisturizer. The Mint and the Shea better are the best flavors/scents IMO. Lasts on your lips MUCH longer than the typical "chap-stick" and even burts bees brand. Expensive but the little tube actually lasts months if applied lightly on a daily basis. Keep one in my car and by my bed. Have bought these over and over thru the years.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: BEST LIP BALM
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip balm I have ever used. I wanted something with SPF for motorcycle rides. So many are waxy sticks that reek of fake, plastic coconut scent. I am very pleased with the cool minty scent and sensation of this product (it does not burn). The product is on the thinner side but not runny. It feels great; not sticky or slippery. Although the brand markets toward men this one is great for the ladies. I can even wear it under lipstick without issue. Jack Black is CRUELTY-FREE.
customer_reviews.author: Munkey

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Natural Mint & Shea Butter, and it’s great. It’s very moisturizing and makes my lips very soft. The smell is great, very minty and makes my lips tingle a bit, which I like. I don’t lick my lips so I don’t know if it’s tastes like anything, but when I drink something I don’t taste it.. the SPF in it doesn’t bother me and I’m very sensitive to it in lip products. I’m a woman and I recommend this for anyone. I went ahead and ordered the 3 pack of Natural Mint so I’ll update if I need to, otherwise I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Stays on and works for hours
customer_reviews.text: Hours later after many drinks my lips still feel like I just put this on. I can’t handle most lip anything. And this stuff works and feels great. My forever lip lover.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Petroleum based. Not very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. This was not what i was looking for. Be aware it contains mostly petroleum which i dont find to be very moisturizing. Im a chapstick addict and this stuff just sits on top of my lips in a goopy mess. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Alice D.

customer_reviews.title: Not Real Product
customer_reviews.text: If you compare the ingredient listing and general branding to the actual Jack Black Lip Therapies packaging they are not the same. In hind sight I should have taken a photo but because I was unhappy I just threw it away. I then ordered it immediately from Sephora, which is certain to be the real product. Not the Real Jack Black Lip Therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real stuff! I’m an avid user of Jack Black lip products and this is not real. So many discrepancies! The packaging is not the right shade of blue and the product itself is very drying. Very disappointed as I purchased 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: This product works.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been bothered by dry lips and been unsuccessful in finding a product that worked on the problem. Lots of money spent on potential solutions. This is an excellent product. It works overnite. There's no need to reapply it throughout the day or even night after night. It doesn't leave a gummy mess on your lips or teeth. It has a pleasant, minor scent. I feel it is a quality product worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: china gal

customer_reviews.title: So Sticky!
customer_reviews.text: I love lip balm and am always questing for my favorite one. I bought this as a gift for a friend and one for myself and it is just so sticky. After a few minutes of wearing it it would cake into the rolled, sticky goop that lip balms sometimes leave behind. I exfoliate my lips and generally take good care of my skin and just could not get into this product. It reminded me of my awful middle school clear J.Lo sticky lip gloss days and the scent seems cheap and plastic-y.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Balm was everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Because we loved this balm, we were so bummed that the balm keep gobing up around the applicator and under the cap, wasting a lot. We eventually figured out that there was a crack in the tube by the applicator, but only after balm getting all over pockets, handbags and the car. Such a bummer! We need our balm in sunny Arizona!
customer_reviews.author: R. Lo

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what it is in this lip balm it makes my lips red and puffy. It may work great for others but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tikki MarsTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: 40% PETROLEUM- NO WAY!
customer_reviews.text: Hard pass on Jack Black products. This lip balm contains 40% Petroleum! Are you kidding, Jack Back?? No, sadly it's for real. There are so many great organic lip balms that do not use poison like Petroleum- Lizard Lips and Eco Lips for example, both of which are also available on Amazon, and are 100% organic. Seriously... Get with the times Jack Black.
customer_reviews.author: Yeah, OK.

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing for chapped lips!
customer_reviews.text: It could be related to snoring (embarrassing) but I often have chapped lips. This is truly a miracle product that provides intense moisture every time that I wear it. I am trying to make a habit of putting it on before bed. I try to take it with me everywhere in case the chapping creeps up on me! I also carry a hand held mirror to check (probably another issue) Truly a great, affordable product for dry lips!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W

customer_reviews.title: Why dont you have this product yet!?
customer_reviews.text: Speaking as a carmex addict I have tried this product and no longer need it!!!! I'd apply carmex multiple times throughout the day and I only had to apply this product 3 times. Not because I needed to either. The smell is great and product is very moisturizing. Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: EXPANSIVE BUT WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: This lip balm does what others cannot: MOISTURIZE! My lips are severely dry and on top of that the index of humidity gets as low as 10% where I live in Colorado. This ointment is so efficient I am able to wear lipstick again! It's expensive but worth it. I have them every where around the house, and on my purse. My favorite flavor is Natural Mint and Shea. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Luiza WelchTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Best Lip Balm Ever
customer_reviews.text: We love Jack Black lip balm! It moisturizes without being sticky and has been really helpful when the weather is dry. I prefer the shea and lemon. Some of the other flavors seem "flowery" to me. The new pineapple mint is also really nice when I want a minty balm. It's our favorite lip balm and we love it so much, we purchased some as stocking stuffers for family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Best lip 👄 product EVER, says I.
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. My lips stay hydrated, I no longer have peeling or flaking. I like the little tingle that my lips feel. Not greasy feeling. The best 8 bucks I've ever spent. I have used a 20 dollar tube of lanolips but jack black is way better. ❤❤💋💋
customer_reviews.author: Phillip minnix

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't call it...mint.😖
customer_reviews.text: It's NOT mint as some reviews have said...IMHO anyway. It's more of a menthol. I was looking for a nice gentle mint flavor & NO sensation. This punches you in the face with that kind of cold feeling you get from mentholated products. Good moisture, heald my lips & I assume good spf protection...we'll see once I start walking in colder weather. Might try a different flavor.
customer_reviews.author: S.LEE

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lipbalm with a Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Scent/flavor is appealing and Smells just like you'd expect. A little goes a long way. Makes my lips smooth. Nice simple ingredient list so you know what you're putting on your body. Cons: The scent is very strong and doesn't fade quickly so it's a bit distracting when all you want is your lips to not be dry. Tube is a little smaller than other tube lip balms.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Solved my problem!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with chapped lips for years, I've been dependent in using lipbalm and it still doesn't solve the problem. I saw this product in amazon and read the reviews so I tried it. It really made a difference and my lips aren't as chapped anymore. I had to apply this at night so it moisturizes my lips overnight, if I forget then I will have chapped lips the next day. I apply this also after I put on lipstick and it looks & feels good on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Bellez

customer_reviews.title: Lip balm with SPF
customer_reviews.text: I like that this has spf so it’s worth it just for that aspect. It’s clear and adds a lot of shine like lip gloss and it does go on thick at first. Although I find that it wears off or soaks in after awhile. It doesn’t make my lips peel like other balms and I think it would be good for layering with lipstick even though I haven’t tried it yet. I don’t know if it was meant as a men’s product but I’m pretty sure it would work for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: UGH- No Thank You
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this lip balm. Unfortunately, I was disappointed with the scent/taste which was utterly horrid. I would advise not trying the black tea blackberry variety. Perhaps other flavors are better, but for $8- I won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen filters used degrade each other; pleasant to wear
customer_reviews.text: I didn't check before my purchase but the sunscreen filters used are Octinoxate and Avobenzone, and Octinoxate degrades the already-unstable Avobenzone and none of the other ingredients suggesting that they're present to stablise Avobenzone. I purchased this for sun protection but there is little guarantee that it would do its job. Otherwise I enjoy the mint flavour, it's moisturising and not much lip balm is dispensed by the packaging (so it'll probably last a long time). I will use it up but won't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Never Going Back
customer_reviews.text: My lips were cracked to the point of bleeding and peeling, bc of some medication I started taking. I opted to buy Aquaphor first, even though its full of gross synthetic chemical, bc some reviews on this page saying it stayed on better (it does) and is half the price (it is), After two weeks I gave in and ordered the Jack Black anyway, and here's my takeaway: 1) Aquaphor tastes like poison. This balm (lemon) tastes like ice cream. 2) After 3x using overnight, my lips are back to being soft, and even the cracks on the sides of my mouth have healed. Bottom line, next time I'm springing for the 3-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Subtle
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I expected this lip balm to feel very healing and my lips to feel really soft after using. Ive used it overnight for the last few days and have been happy with it, but I guess I expected more. Maybe I was thinking it would be more like a mask vs balm? If you suffer from dry lips and want something that will help without being too heavy and for daily wear, you might like this.
customer_reviews.author: Carly McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have a very bad chapped lips. Most (Sally, Nivea, blisstex, Burt's, etc, etc) lip gloss\chapstick dries me out way more than it helps. I've tried sunscreen free. I've tried just straight vit e. While idk if it's moisturizing enough, it does provide a nice smooth mildly pleasant non gender specific protective gloss. It's thick, and a little goes a long way. It's not as good as putting "working hands" or "aloe vesta" on my lips, but it's less obvious than a big tube and it has its own applicator.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 40 year old skin - peppermint flavor
customer_reviews.text: I apply this in the winter before bed. When I have a cold and my lips and nose skin get dried out from using so many tissues, I will rub this all over them to prevent getting that dry flaky skin that occurs. I hate going back to the office after having a cold with skin flakes all over my nose, rubbing this on my nose prevents that and has a nice cooling vapor effect thanks to the pepppermint.
customer_reviews.author: IthacaRed

customer_reviews.title: Buy it NOW
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much have an obsession with lip balm. I have eternally dry lips, especially while taking Accutane, and it drives me crazy... so I’ve tried countless lip balms and finally found my GOAT. This one smells like marshmallows to me but not in an over powering way. My lips get hydrated and a bit shiny and this allows me to rub my lips together without it somehow disappearing. The formula is thick but not sticky; it’s smooth. Seriously, buy it now.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Rhe

customer_reviews.title: Strong mint
customer_reviews.text: Very strong mint flavor. I would not buy again. It makes my lips tingle and feels like peppermint toothpaste . If you have sensitive skin I would look for a different flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Star

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Lip Balm
customer_reviews.text: I have chapped lips all year round, and they're extra dry during the winter. It's hard to find a lip balm that works, but JACK BLACK is definitely one of the best products I've ever used. It soothed my dry, painful lips almost instantly and it really last a long time. I'll apply it before bed time and can still feel it when I wake up in the morning. It works great while I'm outdoors in freezing temps I like that it's SPF 25. I've finally found the perfect lip balm and would recommend anyone to try.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Furtado

customer_reviews.title: Worked when nothing else did!
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering from chapped lips that were so painful and even the corners of my mouth were effected. I had tried Carmex, plain Vaseline, Chapstick, and Eos. Nothing was giving me any relief. I started searching Amazon and decided to give Jack Black a try. I wasn't crazy about the price, but needed relief. Product goes on smoothly and has a nice minty flavor. Lips are so much better. I can eat salty foods with out pain again. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: cool girl

customer_reviews.title: Dry lip relief finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many products with no relief for my lips. They have been dry, chapped and flaky during both winter and summer. The problem was growing worse and expanding to the skin around my lips. It was embarrassing and uncomfortable. Thankfully I saw the great reviews for Jack Black lip balm and gave it a try. Right away, this wonderful product worked magic on my lips. I finally have nice moist lips! I have ordered several of the flavors. They all seem to have the same great moisturizing properties and have a good but minimal flavoring. My favorite is the mint with shea butter.
customer_reviews.author: TinyDancer

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Softer Lips
customer_reviews.text: It works well if you, unlike me, regularly apply on your lips. I'm so bad with beauty/wellness routine and regiment, always hoping for a quick fix. While the initial application does wonders, I know with consistency this product would be even better. I wait til my lips are downright awful to use this healer :x. BUT it really works, after years of trying chopsticks, vasceline, etc.
customer_reviews.author: darkgothamite

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price🙌
customer_reviews.text: Incredible!!!! The only chapstick/lip balm I completely trust to heal chapped lips! It’s a bit thick so I don’t use it every day- I like to put a good coat on before I sleep and in the morning my lips are suuuper smooth and moisturized. If you need it daily you really only need a thin layer. I have maybe 5 jack black brand lip balms all diff flavors lying around the house, and probably deep in my purse lol truly recommended this, it’s pricey for lip balm but it’s not drying AT ALL. within minutes of putting it on it calms any dryness or irritation on the lips!
customer_reviews.author: Zin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace the Vaseline lip therapy I had been using for years. It never really worked and in some cases felt like it made things worse. That said, my chapped lips have mostly gone away with this product. I just ordered the shea butter + vitamin E to try since sometimes the mint gets into your mouth and tastes weird for a bit. However, if you can get past that, the mint does feel great on the chapped lips in these winter months. I usually use two or three times a day and that has worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Feels greasy and sticky, needs frequent application
customer_reviews.text: While it has decent sunscreen properties, this balm goes on feeling like vegetable oil - somewhat sticky vegetable oil. It seals the lips with what becomes a sticky coating, not at all pleasing. The lips feel dry after only about 20 minutes, an inconvenient frequency. It has a faint minty flavor, not unappealing but the flavor is as ephemeral as the lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R

customer_reviews.title: It's just not that great for the price :(
customer_reviews.text: I totally expected this to be amazing. The price suggests it's quality, but I feel it just doesn't perform. It is gummy and heavy. The taste is OK. I used it under lipstick, quality lipstick, btw, the 2 didn't mix well. It caked up. Not a problem I thought, so I try to just use it by itself. It doesn't last long enough to know whether or not it is blocking the sun. There are just so many others out there that are a better value and perform to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry45

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Yesssss. My skin, hair and lips are very dry. This stuff is awesome. I'm glad I did not get the mint flavor this lemon tastes good. The moisturizing is the best I've found. I was looking for Bite Agave lip balm when I came across this. I'm so glad to have found Jack Black. It stays on overnight. I can also feel it even after a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Artemesia

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete FAKE! It's NOT the real Jack Black! DON'T PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: New favorite, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It is really hard to find an SPF balm that doesn’t taste horrible or leave a burning sensation on my lips. It’s minty and oh-so-comfortable on my lips. I’ve had melanoma twice (the deadly form of skin cancer) so SPF is critical and I also work in dermatology, trust me: you do NOT want a skin cancer on your lips! Use this product liberally, people! I plan to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Best Lip Balm Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best lip balm I’ve ever used. And I’ve tried many from sticks to oily gels to medicated balms. Moved to a dry climate, lips were splitting due to lost moisture. Then I got this stuff. Goes on a little oily, protects my lips for about 2 days in my dry climate before I have to reapply. THAT’S RIGHT 2 DAYS. I only have to apply every other evening with this stuff. Still amazed. I regret I have but five stars to give. This stuff shouldn’t even be spoken of in the same sentence with other lip balms. It’s in a whole different category of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keehn

customer_reviews.title: Gritty Balm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the natural mint & shea butter flavor which was alright and not too overbearing. The balm feels tacky and some parts of it had a gritty texture that I could feel on my lips, which I did not enjoy at all. I ended up having to wipe it off my lips and had to keep reapplying until there wasn't a gritty texture to it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for lips
customer_reviews.text: This little $8 tube has changed my life. For going on 12 years I've had almost non stop chapped cracked and peeling lips. It doesn't seem to matter the season or even be related to time spent outdoors. I'd just learned to live with it and cringe when I'd see close ups of my face. I happened upon a post in a women's hiker forum and this brand was heavily recommended. For the first time in many years I can smile without my lips hurting and can eat without them burning. It stays on even after brushing my teeth. It's so nice to feel soft lips again after all these years.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebearee

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. How did a post-2 bottles-of-wine amazon shopping spree find me my favorite chapstick? I have not used any other chapstick since I opened the package that brought this to my door. EDIT: Changing to three stars because my wow-this-is-great changed to wow-they-skimpt-us-all. I can not believe how little product they give in each tube. I'll savor the last two or three uses I get from this tube. I will have to find a new go-to chapstick that isn't a half tube filled with amazing product. Shame ))):
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Dia

customer_reviews.title: A lot similar to Vaseline, or Aquaphor
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wish I could’ve tried this lip balm on before ordering, lol. The texture on my lips feels like Vaseline/Aquaphor, which is what I don’t. I ordered the Natural Mint & Shea Butter and the smell is great— not weird at all, which is really why I gave it 3 STARS rather than 1-2 STAR rating. It will prob be the lip balm I use in my nightly routine, so my lips can be plump by the next morning. It didn’t make my lips tingle, swell, nor get a plump effect like persay Carmex would, or a lip plumper/ gloss. ANYWAYS, it would be great for a guy, but I wouldn’t recommend it to any of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: HaySam

customer_reviews.title: Works almost instantly
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about this product because I seem always to have dry, chapped lips. This works. Almost instantly. I also used this on a small blister of dry skin under my eyebrow. Cleared this up too! I have told others about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ya-Ya

customer_reviews.title: Best lip balm ever invented
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to everything. I can't even use EOS lip balms, they break my lips out into little bumps and other lip balms dry my lips out. This stuff not only smells fantastic, but it is thick without being gloppy, and it performs like a high end luxury lip product. So worth the purchase. You will never buy another lip balm again, like, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: ffs. quit debating and just buy it
customer_reviews.text: My lips are chapped 24/7/365. Fall and winter are miserable. I go through chapstick like a kid goes throw Halloween candy. This is the first lip balm that I didn't reapply every 30 minutes. The only bad thing about this lip balm is that it doesn't send you a notification when you accidentally throw it in with the laundry. It's expensive compared to drug store lip balm but I could never go back to using that stuff again. I lost this and held off for about a week, thinking I would be fine with some EOS or something.. the only regret I have about buying this is not getting a backup the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best lip balm ever and, yes, it bears the name of THE Jack Black
customer_reviews.text: I wondered if the School of Rock star was selling this lip balm; yes, he is! And he's got a line of skin care products. If this lip balm is any indication, all his products are fantastic. I'm an old bag and have tried just about every lip balm on the planet. It's too expensive but it does work marvelously -- it actually delivers! Other lip balms pale in comparison. This one is gold.
customer_reviews.author: Ace Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Best lip product ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used so many different lip products over the years. None of them have worked like this stuff! NONE! My lips look and feel better than they ever have. I use it throughout the day and put a nice thick coat of it on at night before I go to bed. It feels great and it doesn’t have a terrible taste to it like other products I’ve tried that are twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy W.

customer_reviews.title: What’s the hype??
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom after not being able to find a brand of lip balms she likes. I thought maybe all the hype was the worth it, but it really isn’t. I get for some people this is the B E S T lip balm ever, but it has a sort of strange texture and it’s extremely small. In my opinion Ultra Mentha is a better brand neither of us really enjoyed this product which is extremely rare for both of us because we aren’t picky when it comes to lip balm. Save your money and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Baetsle

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness
customer_reviews.text: Y’all, I have bought every kind of chapstick there is. I grew up in Texas and the other brands were enough to get me by. BUT then I moved to Colorado and my lips were chapped for two weeks strait! I’ve never experienced that in my life, I was so stressed about it and I took a chance on this and I am so happy I did! Within a day my lips were smooth and soft. Bought two more! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS, order it.
customer_reviews.text: This WORKS, order it. I’ve had chapped and dry lips, especially from riding my motorcycle for long durations and obviously not being able to reapply chap stick due to helmet. I’ve tried overnight lip “masks” and other hydrating formulas that always felt like a slick layer vs. this balm that works it’s way into your lips to moisturize. I got this yesterday and applied once throughout the day and then slept with it overnight. Woke up to lips that felt healthy and no dry spots (I bite lip from time to time and it causes a weird mark).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. KP

product_meta.title: Jack Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Natural Mint & Shea Butter

Keeping lips protected from wind, sun, and harmful UVA and UVB rays can be a challenge. For those seeking superior lip protection, Jack Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm is a premium solution. This high-quality, emollient balm is enriched with superior skin conditioners and antioxidants and has been carefully balanced with certified organic ingredients to soothe and relieve dry, chapped, and irritated lips. Unlike waxy sticks, Intense Therapy Lip Balm quickly penetrates for instant relief. It carries a SPF 25 rating and offers optimum sun protection, while guarding against windburn and extreme temperatures.

Jack Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm is packed with certified organic ingredients that work together to protect your lips from exposure to the elements. Its lip protection is enhanced with UVA and UVB absorbers avobenzone and octinoxate. Petrolatum is an FDA-approved skin protectant that is a highly effective moisturizing agent that forms a protective barrier, preventing water loss and acting to repair chapped, damaged skin. Shea butter and avocado oil are natural emollients that provide superior moisturization and conditioning. Vitamin E is known as an antioxidant superstar that works to protect cells against free-radical damage, while green tea provides anti-inflammatory properties to offer an additional layer of protection.

All Jack Black products are carefully formulated with the finest ingredients to be highly effective, yet easy to use. Every Jack Black product is dermatologist tested, paraben free, cruelty free, and free of harsh surfactants. Almost all of the products in our line are vegan, free of artificial colorants, safe for sensitive skin, and made in the USA. For best results, apply Jack Black Intense Therapy Lip Balm generously and evenly to lips 30 minutes before going out in the sun, or whenever they feel dry or chapped. 



BRAND STORY
By Jack Black
